participant_1.background:
I want a home with a large enough space to host my tutoring sessions.
i don t like acting.
my parents are both over age 100.
I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.

participant_2.background:
I like to make things with my hands.
I won a golf trophy in a tournament when I was 10 years old.
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i like to take photos.
i am fluent in spanish.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. Nice to meet you! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make things with my hands, take photos, and run and skateboard to stay active and clear my head.
Oh, that's cool! I like to take photos too. What kind of things do you like to make?
I like to make jewelry, furniture, and other small items. I'm also learning to play the guitar.
Wow, that's really impressive! I'm not very crafty, but I do enjoy listening to music. What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially like rock and blues.
Oh, cool! I like rock and blues too. Do you have any favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin. What about you?
I like those bands too! I also like the Doors, the Jimi Hendrix Experience, and the Eagles.
